thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Senate Readies Rollback of Bank Rules

author: Andrew Ackerman
title: Senate Readies Rollback of Bank Rules
text:
WASHINGTONâ€”The Senate is expected this month to approve the most significant rollback of postcrisis financial rules since Republicans took control of Washington last year.
The bipartisan legislation, supported by the Trump administration and top Federal Reserve officials, would relax dozens of rules for small to medium-size banks, shaking up the banking sector with policy changes that could encourage deal-making and make it easier for banks to expand.
